metadata.title: FrostyLabs - Automate Crypto Research in Minutes, Not Hours | AI Blockchain Workflows
metadata.description: Build AI workflows that analyze tokens, track wallets, and automate DeFi trading across 35+ networks. No-code automation for crypto traders and developers. Free beta launching December 2025.
metadata.keywords: AI crypto automation, blockchain workflow automation, no-code DeFi tools, token analysis automation, AI trading bot builder

hero.title: Automate Crypto Research
hero.subtitle: in Minutes, Not Hours
hero.description: Build AI workflows that analyze tokens, track wallets, and execute trades automatically. No coding required. Works across 35+ blockchains.
hero.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email for instant early access
hero.successMessage: ‚úÖ You're in! Check your email for instant access. Welcome to FrostyLabs.

useCases.title: What Will You Automate?
useCases.subtitle: From social media to DeFi trading, FrostyFlow handles it all. Build once, run forever.
useCases.cta: These are just the beginning. What will you build?

socialMedia.subtitle: Content creation ‚Üí Scheduling ‚Üí Multi-platform posting
features: GPT-5 generates engaging posts from trending topics
Browser automation posts to Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram

defiTrading.subtitle: Monitor ‚Üí Analyze ‚Üí Execute ‚Üí Notify
features: Monitor token prices across DEXs in real-time
AI analyzes market trends & identifies opportunities
Execute swaps via secure thirdweb vault (35+ networks)
Instant notifications on trades & portfolio changes

evmContract.subtitle: Deploy ‚Üí Interact ‚Üí Monitor ‚Üí Manage

Automated contract calls with thirdweb SDK

customerSupport.title: AI Customer Support
customerSupport.subtitle: Receive ‚Üí Classify ‚Üí Respond ‚Üí Escalate
features: Receive inquiries from email, chat, social media
AI classifies urgency & routes to right department
Generate personalized responses with RAG search
Auto-escalate complex issues to human agents

contentCreation.subtitle: Research ‚Üí Write ‚Üí Edit ‚Üí Publish ‚Üí Promote
features: Research agent gathers data from web & databases
Writer agent creates blog posts, articles, scripts
Editor agent refines tone, grammar, SEO optimization
Auto-publish to CMS & promote on social media

pricing.title: Beta Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Get lifetime 50% discount by joining our beta‚Äîlock in your pricing before we launch.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build, deploy, and scale AI automation workflows.

multiModel.title: Multi-Model AI
multiModel.description: Connect GPT-5, Claude, Nebula, and 20+ AI models. Route intelligently based on cost, speed, and quality.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Vault
blockchain.description: 15+ blockchain operations powered by thirdweb with AWS Nitro Enclave security.

workflow.title: Workflow Automation
workflow.description: Visual workflow builder with cron scheduling, webhook triggers, and conditional logic.

analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
analytics.description: Comprehensive monitoring with cost tracking, performance metrics, and optimization insights.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: End-to-end encryption, secure enclaves, and compliance with SOC 2 Type II standards.

nft.title: NFT Subscriptions
nft.description: Own your access rights as NFTs. Transferable, tradeable, and future-proof subscription model.

hero.title: Everything You Need to
hero.description: From AI-powered workflows to blockchain operations, FrostyLabs gives you the tools to build, automate, and scale your business with cutting-edge technology.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Vault Operations
blockchain.subtitle: Execute secure blockchain operations across multiple chains with AWS Nitro Enclave protection.
blockchain.securityNote: All operations are secured by thirdweb Vault SDK with AWS Nitro Enclaves protection.
blockchain.clickPrompt: Click on any blockchain operation above to see detailed information and security features.

transfer.title: Token Transfer
transfer.description: Secure token transfers across multiple chains with gas optimization

swap.title: Token Swap
swap.description: Automated token swapping with best price routing via DEX aggregators

stake.title: Staking
stake.description: Automated staking with yield optimization and reward compounding

bridge.title: Bridge Assets
bridge.description: Cross-chain asset bridging with security verification

mint.title: NFT Minting
mint.description: Bulk NFT minting with metadata management and IPFS storage

deploy.title: Smart Contracts
deploy.description: Automated smart contract deployment and interaction

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: Automated DAO voting and governance participation

yield.title: Yield Farming
yield.description: Automated yield farming with risk management

signup.title: Sign Up in Seconds
signup.subtitle: No crypto knowledge required. Sign up with email, social login, or your existing wallet - we handle the complexity.

emailSocial.title: Email & Social Login
emailSocial.description: Sign up with Google, Discord, Twitter, GitHub, or email - just like any other app.

wallet.title: Connect Your Wallet
wallet.description: Already have MetaMask, Coinbase Wallet, or another wallet? Connect it instantly.

steps.title: In-App Wallet Created Automatically
steps.description: When you sign up, thirdweb creates a secure blockchain wallet for you automatically - no setup required.

steps.title: No Private Keys to Manage
steps.description: Your wallet is secured by your login method (email, Google, etc.). No seed phrases to write down or lose.

steps.title: Ready to Use Blockchain Features
steps.description: Purchase NFT subscriptions, execute blockchain workflows, and interact with smart contracts - all without crypto complexity.

steps.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
steps.description: Powered by thirdweb's infrastructure with AWS Nitro Enclaves - your keys are never exposed.

bestPart.title: The Best Part?
bestPart.description: You get all the benefits of blockchain (NFT subscriptions, secure workflows, multi-chain support) without needing to understand how it works. Just sign up and start automating!

security.title: Secure Blockchain Wallet Management
security.subtitle: Your workflows can create and manage blockchain wallets with enterprise-grade security powered by thirdweb Vault SDK and AWS Nitro Enclaves.

vault.title: What is thirdweb Vault?
vault.description: thirdweb Vault is a secure key management system that allows your workflows to create and control blockchain wallets for automated operations - like a robot that can sign transactions on your behalf.

features.title: Create Wallets in Workflows
features.description: Your automation workflows can create dedicated blockchain wallets for specific tasks (trading bots, NFT minting, etc.)

features.title: Sign Transactions Automatically
features.description: Workflows can sign blockchain transactions, messages, and smart contract calls without manual approval

features.title: Multi-Chain Support
features.description: Works across all 35+ supported blockchain networks - Ethereum, Polygon, Base, Arbitrum, and more

features.title: You Stay in Control
features.description: Only you can access and manage your workflow wallets - they're tied to your account

nitro.title: AWS Nitro Enclaves
nitro.description: Private keys are stored in AWS Nitro Enclaves - isolated, hardware-protected environments that even AWS administrators cannot access.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All communication with vault wallets uses xChaCha20-Poly1305 encryption with perfect forward secrecy.
features: Private keys never leave the enclave
Encrypted at rest and in transit

hero.title: Building the Future of
hero.description: FrostyLabs is on a mission to democratize AI automation and make blockchain technology accessible to everyone. We're building the tools that will power the next generation of automated workflows.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: We believe that AI automation should be accessible, secure, and truly decentralized. Our mission is to democratize AI workflow automation by combining the power of multiple AI models with the security and ownership benefits of blockchain technology.
mission.paragraph2: Through NFT-based subscriptions, we're creating a new paradigm where users truly own their access rights, can trade them freely, and benefit from the value they create in the ecosystem.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where AI automation is as accessible and tradable as any digital asset, where users control their own destiny, and where the power of artificial intelligence is harnessed by everyone, not just large corporations.

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.subtitle: Built with cutting-edge technologies for maximum performance, security, and scalability.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey to revolutionize AI automation and blockchain integration.

items.text: Frosty Agent: AI Agent & Application Builder - Create custom AI agents and small AI applications
Frosty Agent: Natural Language Workflow Creation - Generate workflows from user descriptions
Nebula AI model integration - Advanced AI model for enhanced performance
RAG search & semantic document search (Pro tier)

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Connect with developers, AI enthusiasts, and blockchain pioneers building the future of automation.
